attributes.action: Spend all monies collected from road fund tax, road fuel tax & speeding taxation on road infastructure improvements and road repairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Spend all monies collected from road fund tax, road fuel tax & speeding taxation on road infastructure improvements and road repairs. This will help the economic development of Britain, and aid the free movement and availability of goods and people, improve services and cut down on wasted fuel by reducing road conjestion.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Spend all monies collected from road fund tax, road fuel tax & speeding taxation on road infastructure improvements and road repairs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
